topic.title: EMS Vital Signs Section - conformance rules

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.23"
SHALL conform to Consol Vital Signs Section template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.4.1)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="8716-3" Vital Signs (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10252)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title and SHOULD equal "EMS Vital Signs" (CONF:10254)

SHALL contain at least one [1..*] entry (CONF:10255)
Such entrys SHALL conform to Derived Entry template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.24)
Such entrys SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] organizer (CONF:10256)
This organizer SHALL conform to Consol Vital Signs Organizer template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.26)
This organizer SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime (CONF:10257)
NEMSIS Trace: EVitals.01
This organizer SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] component
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation
This observation SHALL conform to Consol Vital Sign Observation template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.27)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="8480-6" Intravascular systolic (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10280)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value (CONF:10281)
NEMSIS Trace: EVitals.06 UCUM units SHOULD be "mm[Hg]".
This observation MAY contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime (CONF:7304)
NEMSIS Trace: EVitals.01
This organizer SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] component
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation
This observation SHALL conform to Consol Vital Sign Observation template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.27)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="8462-4" Intravascular diastolic (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10282)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value (CONF:10283)
NEMSIS Trace: EVitals.07 UCUM units SHOULD be "mm[Hg]".
This observation MAY contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime
NEMSIS Trace: EVitals.01
This organizer SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] component
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation
This observation SHALL conform to Consol Vital Sign Observation template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.27)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10285)/@code="8867-4" Heart rate (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10284)
This observation SHALL contain zero or more [0..*] value (CONF:10286)
NEMSIS Trace: EVitals.10 UCUM units SHOULD be "/min".
This observation MAY contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime
NEMSIS Trace: EVitals.01
This organizer SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] component
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation
This observation SHALL conform to Consol Vital Sign Observation template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.27)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="9279-1" Breaths (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10287)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value (CONF:10288)
NEMSIS Trace: EVitals.14 UCUM units SHOULD be "/min".
This observation MAY contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime
NEMSIS Trace: EVitals.01
This organizer SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] component
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation
This observation SHALL conform to Consol Vital Sign Observation template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.27)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="8310-5" Body temperature (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10289)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value (CONF:10290)
NEMSIS Trace: EVitals.24 UCUM units SHOULD be "Cel".
This observation MAY contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime
NEMSIS Trace: EVitals.01
This organizer SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] component
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="2710-2" Oxygen saturation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10291)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value (CONF:10292)
NEMSIS Trace: EVitals.12 UCUM units will typically be "%".
This observation Contains zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime
Such entrys MAY contain zero or one [0..1] observation
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67518-1" Obtained prior to units EMS care (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10273)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type BL
NEMSIS Trace: EVitals.02
Such entrys MAY contain zero or one [0..1] organizer
This organizer SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)
This organizer MAY contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime
NEMSIS Trace: EVitals.01
This organizer MAY contain zero or one [0..1] component {subsets Organizer::component}
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] component (CONF:10313)
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10325)/@code="9267-6" Glasgow coma score.eye opening (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10324)
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type INT (CONF:10326)
NEMSIS Trace: EVitals.19
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] component (CONF:10314)
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10328)/@code="9268-4" Glasgow coma score.motor (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10329)
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type INT (CONF:10330)
NEMSIS Trace: EVitals. 21
This component MAY contain zero or one [0..1] component (CONF:10315)
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10322)/@code="55285-1" Glasgow coma score special circumstances (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10321)
This component MAY contain zero or more [0..*] value with data type CD (CONF:10323)
NEMSIS Trace: EVitals.22
This component SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] component (CONF:10316)
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10319)/@code="9269-2" Glasgow coma score.total (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10318)
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type INT (CONF:10320)
NEMSIS Trace: EVitals.23 Integer value equal to the sum of verbal, motor, and eye
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] component (CONF:10317)
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10332)/@code="9270-0" Glasgow coma score.verbal (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10333)
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type INT (CONF:10334)
NEMSIS Trace: EVitals.20
This component MAY contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime
NEMSIS Trace: EVitals.01
This organizer MAY contain zero or one [0..1] component {subsets Organizer::component}
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10308)/@code="67520-7" Stroke scale overall interpretation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10307)
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD (CONF:10310), where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet Stroke Scale Interpretation 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.93 STATIC (CONF:10309)
NEMSIS Trace: EVitals.29
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] methodCode (CONF:10312), where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet StrokeScale 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.88 STATIC (CONF:10311)
NEMSIS Trace: EVitals.30
This component MAY contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime
NEMSIS Trace: EVitals.01
This organizer MAY contain zero or one [0..1] component {subsets Organizer::component}
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="56840-2" Pain severity verbal numeric scale (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10306)
This component Contains exactly one [1..1] value with data type INT
NEMSIS Trace: EVitals.27 An ordinal value between 0 and 10, inclusive. There are three scales, but the values are equivalent.
This component MAY contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime
NEMSIS Trace: EVitals.01
This organizer MAY contain zero or one [0..1] component {subsets Organizer::component}
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10303)/@code="67775-7" Level of responsiveness (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10302)
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD (CONF:10305), where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet LevelOfResponsiveness 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.21 STATIC (CONF:10304)
NEMSIS Trace: EVitals.26
This component MAY contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime
NEMSIS Trace: EVitals.01
This organizer MAY contain zero or one [0..1] component {subsets Organizer::component}
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10300)/@code="2339-0" Glucose (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10299)
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type PQ (CONF:10301)
NEMSIS Trace: EVitals.18 UCUM units will typically be "mg/dl".
This component MAY contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime
NEMSIS Trace: EVitals.01
This organizer MAY contain zero or one [0..1] component {subsets Organizer::component}
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10297)/@code="19911-7" Diffusion capacity.carbon monoxide (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10296)
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type PQ (CONF:10298)
NEMSIS Trace: EVitals.17 UCUM units will typically be "[ppm]".
This component MAY contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime
NEMSIS Trace: EVitals.01
This organizer MAY contain zero or one [0..1] component {subsets Organizer::component}
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10294)/@code="19889-5" Carbon dioxide/Gas.total.at end expiration (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10293)
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value (CONF:10295)
NEMSIS Trace: EVitals.16 UCUM units will typically be "%".
This component MAY contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime
NEMSIS Trace: EVitals.01
This organizer MAY contain zero or one [0..1] component {subsets Organizer::component}
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10275)/@code="67519-9" Cardiac rhythm (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10274)
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] methodCode (CONF:10277), where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet MethodOfECGInterpretation 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.20 STATIC (CONF:10276)
NEMSIS Trace: EVitals.05
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD (CONF:10278), where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet CardiacRhythmReading 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.16 STATIC (CONF:10279)
NEMSIS Trace: EVitals.03
This component MAY contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime
NEMSIS Trace: EVitals.01
This component SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] participant {subsets Observation::participant}, where its type is CDA Participant2
Contains exactly one [1..1] CDA Participant2
SHALL conform to Consol Vital Signs Section Entries Optional template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.4)
